stable.title: Announcing ImageGlass 9.1.6.14 - In Berlin
stable.description: A major update, supports for advanced color channel viewing, adds Lossless Compression tool, Startup Boost mode, new image loading orders.

kobe.title: Announcing ImageGlass 9.1.6.14 - In Berlin
kobe.description:
A major update, supports for advanced color channel viewing, adds Lossless Compression tool, Startup Boost mode, new image loading orders.
⚠️ Note: Some version 8 features ARE NOT available, please read the blog post before upgrading.
